item.title: Hello World
item.description: “The secret of getting ahead is getting started.” – Mark Twain Welcome to my blog. I will primarily devote this blog to exploring new (at least new to me!) techniques in data science with Python and R. I have wanted to do this for a little while now and am excited to be sharing this journey with you. A few caveats: This blog represents my personal views and learning journey.
